name: ev-db
description: A comprehensive, community-driven platform for electric vehicle data management with contribution workflows, image galleries, and API access.

scripts.build:all: echo '⚠️ Backend build temporarily disabled' && pnpm run build
scripts.test:all: echo '⚠️ Backend tests temporarily disabled' && pnpm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: echo '⚠️ Backend coverage temporarily disabled' && pnpm --filter frontend vitest run --coverage
scripts.lint:all: echo '⚠️ Backend lint temporarily disabled' && pnpm run lint:frontend
scripts.typecheck:all: echo '⚠️ Backend typecheck temporarily disabled' && pnpm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.ci:test: pnpm run typecheck:all && pnpm run lint:all && pnpm run test:coverage
